## SERVICES
headline: Save Time Managing Your Business With Our Best Services
features:
- Patient Management: Keep track of every visit, treatment, and history effortlessly. Manage appointments, follow-ups, and patient data in one place.
- Revenue & Expense Tracking: Track revenue and expenses effortlessly, giving you clear insights into where you spend more and how to grow smarter.
- Inventory Management: Never run out of essential or fast-selling products again. Track stock levels, usage, and availability in real time.
- Business Insights: Make data-driven decisions with real-time analytics. Understand your growth, top services, and profit trends.
- Staff & Role Management: Assign roles, set permissions, and monitor staff performance with ease. Keep your team organized, secure, and productive.
- Billing & PDF Downloads: Simplify your billing process with accuracy and speed. Generate professional invoices, track payments, and download detailed PDF reports instantly.

cta: Join Waiting List

---

## PROCESS
headline: Get Started with Zynva in 3 Simple Steps
description: Migrate your data, complete quick setup, and start managing your entire clinic operations effortlessly. Everything you need, accessible in just 3 clicks.
steps:
- Data Migration: Seamlessly migrate your existing clinic data with our automated import tools. Transfer patient records, inventory, billing history, and more in just a few clicks.
- Quick Setup: Configure your clinic settings, staff roles, and preferences in minutes. Our intuitive interface makes setup effortless with guided wizards.
- Manage Everything in 3 Clicks: Access all features from one dashboard. Manage patients, track revenue, monitor expenses, control inventory, and generate reports - everything you need in just 3 clicks.
